start.text: Soon your fleet will glow like the Sun.
How do you expect to fight this? Your weapons are no match for my power.
You better bring a lot of sunblock with you.
All forces, prepare for the next assault.

start_boss.text: Now, where did I put those launch codes...
I hope your readout isn't down, I'd hate for you to miss what's coming next.
How many nukes you think it will take me to destroy that new weapon, commander?

retreat.text: We have suffered great loses at your hand, but this is not over yet.
Another moment and I would have reduced you to dust.
Ha, you are lucky to have survived this battle intact. Challenge me again, if you dare.

out_of_missiles.text: Don't worry, the warheads are on their way.
Okay, commander, that's enough, I'm running out of nukes!
We have been waiting for you! Please, accept our gifts.
No missiles? Who could think of such a thing.

engaged.text: The glow! The wonderful glow! Can you not see it?
Ah, I think this is your half-life.
More gifts, commander. Our generosity is limitless!
Soon, you'll be nothing but radioactive waste.
You cannot stand against my might, captain!

need_help.text: Ahh, no! My warheads, my beautiful warheads! You will pay!
Huh. I cannot believe you are beating me. Perhaps you'll give me a moment to rest?
Coming to inspect the nukes, captain? You can look, but don't touch.

pursuing.text: This is only the beginning. The beginning of the end, heheheh.
Is the heat getting to you?
Oh, maybe you're having a meltdown, huh?
Your defences crack like so many egg shells.
And now, for my final attack! Hold on, captain, you're going to like this. Oh, wait, no, you won't! Hahaha!
Ohh, I see your power is down. Should I send you some nuclear energy? Hahahaha!
Withdrawing those ships? Captain, if you wanted to clear that space, I could have done it for you!

running.text: Sorry for the delay, just gathering my forces.
Remember - don't look directly at the blast.
Why do you want to blow up my ordnance anyway, captain?

hull_90.text: Now the battle begins in its earnest. Prepare yourselves.
Gah! Get out of my face. I will not ask you twice!

hull_50.text: At least it's a dry heat.
Eventually, someone has to win the arms race. Else, what is the point of racing?
Get away from my reactors, captain.

hull_30.text: Time to put on your lead underwear.
Hey, hey! Do you have an idea how much that fusion reactor costs?

overload.text: Ahh, what, I am out of power? How can I be out of power?!
Someone get me more power, now!

death.text: Ahh, no! My warheads, my beautiful warheads! You will pay, captain!
I'd be careful, captain. These nuclear reactors tend to leak.

victory.text: Welcome to the party, commander. I hope you can excuse the mess.
Might makes right. Would you not agree, commander?

victory_boss.text: You call that a super weapon? It breaks like a toy!
